panels.visual: Visual: Lightsword stands at the grove's edge, Pip on shoulder, Darkstorm at side. They pull out FOUR cards - all glowing gold. Determination on their face. Characters: Lightsword, Pip, Darkstorm
panels.dialogue: Lightsword: "All or nothing." (Caption): "Bless. Turn Undead. Smite. Healing Light."

characters.Lightsword: A GLOWING ETHEREAL FIGURE made entirely of soft golden-white light. NOT a lizard, NOT humanoid with defined features - pure luminous energy in vaguely humanoid shape. No visible face, just two bright points of warm light where eyes would be. The entire body GLOWS and PULSES with inner light. Wearing simple cream-colored ceremonial robes that the light shines through. Ethereal, mysterious, magical being of pure radiance.

panels.visual: Visual: SMITE on the chains - they CRACK but hold! (Rolled a 2!) Lightsword strains, pouring more power. Characters: Lightsword, Starwind
panels.dialogue: Lightsword: "Come ON!" (Caption): "The chains held. But heroes don't give up."
